reviews.text: Fantastic experience purchasing our flooring from Carpet Depot.  Scott was very knowledgable and so helpful while we were making our flooring selections. Coordinating the install was quick and efficient and we are so happy with the new flooring.  Will definitely use Carpet Depot for all of our flooring needs.

Shout out to Scott Thomas.......you make customer service look easy. From the first phone call to the follow up call.....every step has been seamless, professional, guided, timely, cost efficient and more than what I expected. I am speechless and impressed by the carpet selection and the install. The install team was the bomb.com in and out with precision......they cleaned up so well the new carpet was the only indicator of them being there. Keep up the great work and look for some referrals to come your way. A referral gift card bonus would be nice......Thanks a million!

I’m thrilled to share how impressed I am with my new carpets! The quality is outstanding, and the customer service exceeded my expectations once again. I’m so grateful I chose this business for the second time — they’ve truly earned my trust and loyalty. Highly recommended!
My wife actually discovered the store while driving through Jonesboro. A nice atmosphere with a great selection of carpets to choose from.

Scott was an absolute pleasure to work with.  He came highly recommended from a family member and did not disappoint.  I called to get pricing and he reached back out with competitive flat pricing without the normal games.  He came to the house personally to measure and was very professional.  He took time to explain how to maximize the product across three rooms to save money and get a better product in all rooms.  He did not pressure and when we were ready, we called and ordered.  Within a week, the carpet was in and looks great.  His install team was professional and careful.  Scott even reached out the following day to make sure everything went smoothly.  We will go to Scott for all future flooring needs.
